clinical_study.brief_title: Surveillance for Early Liver Injuries Caused by Xianlin Gubao Capsule.
clinical_study.official_title: A Registry Study to Surveil Early Liver Injuries Caused by Xianlin Gubao Capsule (XLGB Capsule)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective registry study to surveil early liver injuries caused by Xianlin Gubao Capsule (XLGB Capsule) through a non-intervention observational way. And attempt to establish a predictive model to screen susceptibilities to XLGB Capsule.

detailed_description.textblock:
The primary objectives of this study include:
(i) The detection of patients with serum liver biochemistry abnormalities within 8 weeks after intake of XLGB Capsule; (ii) The record of overall individuals with demographics, underlying diseases, physical status, medication information, clinical laboratory index, and so on; (iii) The specimen collection of surveiled individuals. (iv) The attempt to establish a predictive model to screen susceptibilities to XLGB Capsule.

primary_outcome.measure: The detection of patients with serum liver biochemistry abnormalities within 8 weeks after intake of XLGB Capsule.
primary_outcome.time_frame: participants will be followed duration intake of XLGB Capsule, an expected average within 8 weeks
primary_outcome.description: The detection of patients with serum liver biochemistry abnormalities within 8 weeks after intake of XLGB Capsule.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical features of early liver injuries caused by XLGB Capsule assessed by serum parameters of liver function.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: participants will be followed duration intake of XLGB Capsule, an expected average of 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical features of early liver injuries caused by XLGB Capsule assessed by serum parameters of liver function.

other_outcome.measure: Disease progression of early liver injuries caused by XLGB Capsule, i.e. death, liver failure, chronic DILI, recovery.
other_outcome.description: Disease progression of early liver injuries caused by XLGB Capsule, i.e. death, liver failure, chronic DILI, recovery.

arm_group.description: The overall individuals taking XLGB Capsule with recommended dosage and achieving the inclusion criteria.
